data.comment: The match is underway at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
In the minute 5, Felipe Silva (Gwangju) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 7, Ball safe as Ulsan Hyundai is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Gwangju.
In the minute 8, Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 12, Gwangju have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju.
In the minute 15, Can Ulsan Hyundai capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Important block from the Gwangju defence as Hong Chul fires in a strike for Ulsan Hyundai.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
In the minute 17, Hyun Jae Choi signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Gwangju's half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Gwangju in their own half.
Can Gwangju capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ulsan Hyundai's half?
In the minute 20, Gwangju's Du Hyeon-seok misses with an attempt on goal.
Ulsan Hyundai have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 21, Hyun Jae Choi awards the away team a throw-in.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 23, Gwangju's Du Hyeon-seok gets in a shot on goal at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Gwangju have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Willyan.
That's a fine assist from Eom Won-sang.
In the minute 25, Free kick Gwangju.
Dave Bulthuis (Ulsan Hyundai) has received a first yellow card.
Gwangju to take a throw-in in Ulsan Hyundai territory.
In the minute 27, Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Hong Chul of Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 34, Hyun Jae Choi awards Ulsan Hyundai a goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai's Junior Negrao is on target but unsuccessful.
In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 35, Gwangju awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Gwangju.
Gwangju needs to be cautious. Ulsan Hyundai have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 37, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Ulsan Hyundai are coming forward and Lee Sang-heon gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
In the minute 39, Throw-in high up the field for Gwangju in Ulsan.
Gwangju are caught offside.
Ulsan Hyundai to take a throw-in in Gwangju territory.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Ulsan.
The home team replace Lee Sang-heon with Lee Dong-kyeong.
Lee Dong-kyeong for Ulsan Hyundai gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 43, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Seung-hyun Jung gets his shot on target but fails to score for Ulsan Hyundai.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Throw-in Ulsan Hyundai.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Ulsan.
Can Ulsan Hyundai get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gwangju's half?
Junior Negrao (Ulsan Hyundai) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 48, Gwangju have a goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in the half of Gwangju.
In the minute 51, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In Ulsan, Won Du-jae (Ulsan Hyundai) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Ulsan Hyundai are pushing forward but Lee Dong-kyeong's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 53, Hyun Jae Choi awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Gwangju.
Gwangju push forward at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium and Yeo Reum gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ulsan Hyundai defence.
In the minute 55, Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Gwangju's area.
Lee Min-ki (Gwangju) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
Goal kick for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Bjorn Johnsen is on a sub for Chung-Yong Lee for Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 58, Junior Negrao equalizes with a header to make it 1-1.
Great play from Kim Tae-hwan to set up the goal.
The away team have replaced Du Hyeon-seok with Im Min-hyeok. This is the first substitution made today by Park Jin Seob.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
Yoon Bit-garam (Ulsan Hyundai) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
In the minute 61, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Ulsan Hyundai have a dangerous throw-in.
In Ulsan Ulsan Hyundai attack through Junior Negrao. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Gwangju goal kick.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a free kick to Ulsan Hyundai.
At Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium, Im Min-hyeok has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 67, Ulsan Hyundai's Lee Dong-kyeong gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Ulsan.
Hyun Jae Choi signals a Ulsan Hyundai throw-in in Gwangju's half.
In the minute 70, Gwangju are down to 10 men after Willyan has been shown a red card.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Gwangju is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ulsan Hyundai awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 76, Hyun Jae Choi signals a throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai, close to Gwangju's area.
Lee Dong-kyeong (Ulsan Hyundai) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
In the minute 78, Ulsan Hyundai surge into the attack at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium but Bjorn Johnsen’s header is off-target.
Hyun Jae Choi awards Gwangju a goal kick.
Gwangju have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Park Jin Seob (Gwangju) is making a second substitution, with Kim Ju-kong replacing Felipe Silva.
Free kick for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
Kim Do-Hoon is making the team's third substitution at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium with Lee Keun-ho replacing Sin Jin-ho.
In the minute 83, In Ulsan Gwangju drive forward through Eom Won-sang. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Gwangju.
Gwangju awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hyun Jae Choi awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Gwangju in the half of Ulsan Hyundai.
In the minute 85, Kim Hyo-gi is replacing Eom Won-sang for Gwangju at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium.
In the minute 86, In Ulsan a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai in their own half.
Throw-in Gwangju.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Ulsan.
In Ulsan, Yoon Bit-garam of Ulsan Hyundai is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ulsan Hyundai have been awarded a corner by Hyun Jae Choi.
Free kick for Gwangju in their own half.
Junior Negrao of Ulsan Hyundai smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Ulsan Hyundai close to the penalty box.
Bjorn Johnsen for Ulsan Hyundai drives towards goal at Ulsan Munsu Football Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
